feed.title: Trafikito.com Help
feed.subtitle: Trafikito.com initially monitors for free RAM, disk space, CPU and sends email when something wrong but it also can monitor output of any command and execute any API call when something happens.

entry.title: Why does it say “Must be owner or admin”?

link.title: Why does it say “Must be owner or admin”?

entry.content: In particular sections, Trafikito shows a warning message that a member must be the owner or admin. It means that your role is insufficient for that specific view and you need to have a higher role. You can ask admins or owner to make changes.
entry.summary: In particular sections, Trafikito shows a warning message that a member must be the owner or admin. It means that your role is insufficient for that specific view and you need to have a higher role. You can ask admins or owner to make changes.

entry.title: Who can see workspace invoices?
entry.content: All active members of the workspace.
entry.summary: All active members of the workspace.

entry.title: Who can pay for the invoice?

link.title: Who can pay for the invoice?

entry.content: Anyone. Invoices can be paid by any member of the team. Each invoice has a unique ID which identifies when it’s paid; it is not essential for Trafikito to ascertain which member paid. The invoice can be paid or not paid. Keep in mind that we don’t facilitate refunds; while you can use the free plan to check if Trafikito is suitable for you.
entry.summary: Anyone. Invoices can be paid by any member of the team. Each invoice has a unique ID which identifies when it’s paid; it is not essential for Trafikito to ascertain which member paid. The invoice can be paid or not paid. Keep in mind that we don’t facilitate refunds; while you can use the free plan to check if Trafikito is suitable for you.

entry.title: Who can change the workspace settings?

link.title: Who can change the workspace settings?

entry.content: Any active member who has an admin or owner role.
entry.summary: Any active member who has an admin or owner role.

entry.title: Which price plan is best for me?

link.title: Which price plan is best for me?

entry.content:
It depends on what you do. For many, the free plan is enough but if you need members management and have several persons working in the same workspace, then you will need one of the paid plans.

You can read the full blog post on this topic here: How to choose the best pricing plan?
entry.summary: It depends on what you do. For many, the free plan is enough but if you need members management and have several persons working in the same workspace, then you will need one of the paid plans.

entry.title: Where is the workspace switcher and how to make changes to an active workspace?

link.title: Where is the workspace switcher and how to make changes to an active workspace?

entry.content:
On the servers list above all of the servers, click on the current workspace and in the Workspace tab, you will find the drop-down to switch to another workspace or create a new one.

  1. Open the main menu on the top left [menu icon]
  2. Select Dashboard
  3. On top of the servers list, you can see the name of the selected workspace. Click it to open more details
  4. On the top select the Workspace tab
  5. Click on the drop-down with the current workspace name
  6. Select the workspace you want to switch to
entry.summary: On the servers list above all of the servers, click on the current workspace and in the Workspace tab, you will find the drop-down to switch to another workspace or create a new one.

entry.title: What happens when a paid plan expires?

link.title: What happens when a paid plan expires?

entry.content: Only the owner can login to the workspace. As well as all limits are downgraded to the free plan. As a result, you may experience a broken dashboard if your charts depend on the data that is no longer available. Just generate a new invoice to buy more time on the paid plan. After which. it will go back to normal with no extra configuration required.
entry.summary: Only the owner can login to the workspace. As well as all limits are downgraded to the free plan. As a result, you may experience a broken dashboard if your charts depend on the data that is no longer available. Just generate a new invoice to buy more time on the paid plan. After which. it will go back to normal with no extra configuration required.

entry.title: How to add a new workspace?

link.title: How to add a new workspace?

entry.content: When you try to make changes, then try to save it but you don’t have the required role to save changes, Trafikito shows messages that your role is insufficient.
entry.summary: When you try to make changes, then try to save it but you don’t have the required role to save changes, Trafikito shows messages that your role is insufficient.

entry.title: What are the member roles?
entry.content:
User roles are permission policies that determine what the identity can and cannot do. There are 3 member roles: owner, admin, and member. Owners and admins can switch the role of any user between an admin and member. Members cannot make any updates. Only the owner can set a new owner.

  • Only the owner can delete the workspace and set up a new owner
  • Owner and admins can edit all settings and members
  • Members can view everything but can not make any changes
entry.summary: User roles are permission policies that determine what the identity can and cannot do. There are 3 member roles: owner, admin, and member. Owners and admins can switch the role of any user between an admin and member. Members cannot make any updates. Only the owner can set a new owner.

entry.title: What are the benefits of paid plans?

link.title: What are the benefits of paid plans?

entry.content:
For most, the main differences between the free and paid plans are:

  • You get more visibility. Free plan gives 24 hours while the paid plans may provide up to 2 weeks
  • With the paid plan you can add members to the workspace and manage roles
  • With the paid plans you can monitor more commands, set up more notification rules, monitor more servers, send bigger output per minute to Trafikito
entry.summary: For most, the main differences between the free and paid plans are:
